bioghist.p: Brotherhood Cooperative, Inc., or Brudercoop, was established in 1940 (incorporated in 1947) and dissolved in 1964. The Brudercoop was a residence based on the Bruderhof model of cooperative communities. It was located at 759 North 26th Street in Philadelphia.

scopecontent.p: This is a collection of records of the Brudercoop of Philadelphia, Pennsylvania. Materials include: minutes of house meetings; legal records of the cooperative, including bylaws and articles of incorporation, corporate filings, licenses, and articles of dissolution; and documents related to the purchase and eventual sale of the house. The collection also includes a brief history of the cooperative.

accessrestrict.p: The collection is open for research.
